profile.name: Yongfeng Gu
profile.title: Full-Stack Developer · Embedded Engineer
profile.bio: Master's student at Tianjin University, specializing in full-stack development and embedded systems. Proficient in Vue.js frontend development, Node.js backend services, embedded hardware development, and deep learning applications. With hands-on experience in multiple real-world projects, I am passionate about technology and committed to code quality and user experience.
profile.intro: Hello! I'm Yongfeng Gu, a full-stack developer and embedded engineer from Tianjin University. I'm passionate about exploring the endless possibilities of technology, from frontend interfaces to backend services, from embedded hardware to deep learning. I enjoy every step of turning ideas into reality.

other.advantages: Passionate about work, proactive, strong self-learning ability, high self-motivation
other.awards: Third Prize in iCAN National Innovation Competition (Tianjin), Outstanding Student Cadre, Merit Student at Tianjin University

skills.description: Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript core technologies; familiar with SCSS and TypeScript; expert in Vue.js framework, mastering Vue Router, Pinia, Vite ecosystem tools; skilled in using Element Plus component library for page development; capable of integrating RESTful API for frontend-backend data interaction.

Familiar with Node.js and Express framework; able to build basic API services and handle routing and middleware logic; understand MySQL database operations; master Nginx configuration and deployment processes; capable of handling interface security, cross-origin, and data transmission.

Proficient in Python for data analysis and model development; master PyTorch deep learning framework, able to build and train CNN, RNN, Transformer models; equipped with data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model tuning capabilities; familiar with object detection and image classification solutions.

Master ESP32 development and ESP-IDF framework; able to write embedded programs in C/C++ for sensor control, data processing, and communication protocol integration; familiar with UART, TTL, RS485 interface protocols and debugging processes.

Proficient in SolidWorks and Fusion 360 for structural modeling and assembly design; capable of product shell design and interference analysis; master JLCEDA and other PCB design tools, understand circuit board size constraints and basic routing rules.

projects.name: Laser Coupling Alignment System
projects.description: Developed an automatic coupling alignment system for Tianjin Electric Power Construction Company, built a data acquisition system based on multi-sensor fusion (laser + gyroscope), replacing manual micrometer measurement, achieving non-contact real-time monitoring with 3x efficiency improvement and ±0.01mm accuracy.
responsibilities: Structural design: Completed equipment structure design and shell modeling using SolidWorks
Embedded development: Implemented sensor data acquisition, processing, and HTTP communication service with ESP32
Host computer program: Implemented visualization interface and alignment algorithm using web technologies

projects.name: Education Order Management System
projects.description: Developed an order management system for the education industry covering 6 cities, supporting 2k+ daily active users and 300+ daily orders, implementing core functions for order and user management.
responsibilities: Completed frontend design and implementation for employee portal (order upload/management) and teacher portal (order receiving)
Built backend services based on Express framework
Configured Nginx reverse proxy for service deployment

projects.name: Industrial Fixture Remote Control System
projects.description: Developed a highly compatible remote control system for automotive production lines, replacing traditional fixture operation modes to meet multi-model mixed production requirements.
responsibilities: Designed and developed frontend interactive interface and built server on embedded devices
Implemented LAN-based real-time device status monitoring and remote control
projects.achievements: Achieved remote production status control and real-time diagnostics, reducing downtime; supported 16 vehicle model mixed production with 93% changeover efficiency improvement.

projects.name: Deep Learning for Pediatric Pneumonia Treatment
projects.description: Built a deep learning-based medical image analysis system specifically for optimizing glucocorticoid treatment dosage for refractory mycoplasma pneumonia (RMPP) in children. The system automatically assesses pneumonia severity through analysis of DICOM chest X-rays, providing treatment dosage recommendations for clinicians.
responsibilities: Data preprocessing, model training, parameter tuning, and result analysis

education.college: School of Precision Instruments and Optoelectronics Engineering
School of Precision Instruments and Optoelectronics Engineering

campus.description: Responsible for designing work certificates, article headers, managing official account operations, and article layout design
Organized and planned major events such as freshman welcome party and New Year's gala; led team participation in school song and history performance competition, winning excellence award
Led class team-building activities, awarded Outstanding Youth League Branch
Responsible for designing posters and lecture PPTs, organizing branch manuals, organizing studies, planning activities, and writing reports
